frame.name: Kimmi Manga
frame.subtitle: Mint a Reader Pass and start reading manga
frame.description: Kimmi Manga is a manga reading mini app. Mint a Reader Pass NFT to unlock access, track your reading progress onchain, and explore manga chapters with micro unlocks.
